toolbar.hint: Click "Run" on each node to execute
toolbar.clearConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear the workflow?

ai.generate_dataset.label: AI Generate Dataset
ai.generate_dataset.description: Generate realistic datasets using OpenAI based on natural language description

ai.load_dataset.label: Load AI Dataset
ai.load_dataset.description: Load a previously saved AI-generated dataset from database

csv.synthetic.label: Generate Synthetic Data
csv.synthetic.description: Generate synthetic datasets for classification or regression

data.select.label: Select Columns
data.select.description: Select or exclude specific columns from a table

data.transform.label: Transform Columns
data.transform.description: Apply transformations to data (standardization, normalization, etc.)

data.split.label: Train/Test Split
data.split.description: Split dataset into training and test sets

plot.2d.label: 2D Scatter Plot
plot.2d.description: Create interactive 2D scatter plot with color and size mapping

plot.3d.label: 3D Scatter Plot
plot.3d.description: Create interactive 3D scatter plot with rotation and zoom

plot.histogram.label: Histogram
plot.histogram.description: Create histogram for data distribution analysis

ml.regression.label: Regression
ml.regression.description: Train regression model (linear, ridge, lasso, etc.)

nlp.clean_text.label: Clean Text
nlp.clean_text.description: Clean and normalize text (lowercase, remove punctuation, etc.)

ml.kmeans_clustering.label: K-Means Clustering
ml.kmeans_clustering.description: K-Means clustering with automatic optimal K detection

landing.createFirst: Create your first workflow to get started
landing.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this session?

table.hint: Double click on a cell to edit • Enter to save • Esc to cancel

overview.description: DataFlow is a visual workflow platform for data analysis, machine learning, and NLP tasks. Build complex data pipelines by connecting nodes in an intuitive drag-and-drop interface.

steps.1: Drag nodes from the palette on the left
steps.3: Connect nodes by dragging from output handles to input handles
steps.4: Execute nodes individually or run the entire workflow

sources.title: Data Sources
sources.description: Load data from files, databases, or generate synthetic datasets

transform.title: Transform
transform.description: Clean, filter, merge, and transform your data

ml.title: Machine Learning
ml.description: Train and evaluate classification and regression models

nlp.title: NLP
nlp.description: Text analysis, sentiment analysis, and topic modeling

clustering.title: Clustering
clustering.description: Discover patterns with K-Means and other algorithms

cleaning.title: Data Cleaning Pipeline
cleaning.description: Clean and prepare raw data for analysis

regression.title: Regression Model
regression.description: Train a model to predict continuous values
regression.diagram: CSV → Select → Split → [Train → Regression, Test] → Predict → Plot

classification.title: Classification Model
classification.diagram: Dataset → Split → [Train → Classify, Test] → Predict → Plot

clustering.title: Clustering Analysis
clustering.description: Discover natural groups in your data
